trends: There has been one other sighting in Hatboro
There were no other sightings in Hatboro on or around October 12th 2012
Summary: About 20 orange craft flying over warminster pa. I have it on video
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving and saw an orange light flying. Pulled over at Walgreens and started video. About 20 or so orange pulsating lights flew south following each other . It looked like military craft was also around but weren't initially aware of this event and couldn't do anything about it besides set up a perimeter and track them. Approx speed of the craft about 200 mph. So not paper lanterns or flares lol. Just watch my video. This was happening on a Friday night on a busy street and it's funny how oblivious people are and how incredibly thick the denial shield is. Someone please contact me. This was a mass sighting and freaking unreal.
